verbs.description: [ARG1: scana shares] [V: drop] [ARGM-MNR: sharply] [ARGM-CAU: with news law might be overturned the price of shares in the stock of a private south carolina utility] have fallen sharply after suggestions a judge may overturn a law the firm said has been key to its profitability scana corp stock opened this week at 40 91 a share then fell more than 4 a share in less than six hours before rebounding to around 38 a share tuesday the drop came with news reports that a judge asked lawyers for draft orders suggesting the base load review act is unconstitutional the law allowed scana subsidiary south carolina electric gas to charge billions for construction of two failed nuclear plants that never generated power columbia drop scana corp columbia south carolina scana south carolina south carolina electric gas south carolina electric gas s c law

scana shares drop sharply with news law [V: might] be overturned the price of shares in the stock of a private south carolina utility have fallen sharply after suggestions a judge may overturn a law the firm said has been key to its profitability scana corp stock opened this week at 40 91 a share then fell more than 4 a share in less than six hours before rebounding to around 38 a share tuesday the drop came with news reports that a judge asked lawyers for draft orders suggesting the base load review act is unconstitutional the law allowed scana subsidiary south carolina electric gas to charge billions for construction of two failed nuclear plants that never generated power columbia drop scana corp columbia south carolina scana south carolina south carolina electric gas south carolina electric gas s c law
